text: @jaywhyelle The appointment of Mnuchin & Kudlow to the Coronavirus task force proves the obvious-Trump cares about himself by sending false messages about the virus to calm the stock market, not Americans health.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
